---
title: "dsn-extractor"
---


```{python}
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/rubriques.csv")
```

```{python}
ojs_define(data = df)
```

```{ojs}
df = transpose(data)
codes = df.map(d => d.code)
codes
```

```{ojs}
import { SearchForm } from "@floatingpurr/input-autocomplete"
```

```{ojs}
viewof codeDSN = Inputs.text({
  label: "U.S. state",
  placeholder: "Entrer un code",
  value: df.map(d => d.code)[0],
  datalist: df.map(d => d.code)
})
```


```{ojs}
d3.json(`http://localhost:8000/check/${codeDSN}`)
```
